content: --विषय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} expelled or driven away from one's home, residence or proper place; मनोनिर्विषयार्थकामया <ls>Ku. 5. 38</ls>, <ls>R. 9. 32.</ls> {2} having no scope or sphere of action; किंच एवं काव्यं प्रविरलविषयं निर्विषयं वा स्यात् <ls>S. D. 1.</ls> {3} not attached to sensual objects, (as mind).
